alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:14PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Caddo and central Bossier Parishes, eastern Marion, Harrison, northern Panola, northeastern Rusk and central Gregg Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 114 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Smithland to near Karnack to near Marshall to near Hallsville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Longview, Bossier City, Marshall, White Oak, Hallsville, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Jefferson, Benton, Tatum, Oil City, Clarksville City, East Mountain, Mooringsport, Belcher, Deberry, Elysian Fields and Eastwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and northeastern Texas.
